Keywords: Generation X , S.W.O.R.D. , X-Men
Real Name: Everett Thomas
Special Powers
HELLFIRE GALA: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character with the X-Men keyword attacks and the attack roll includes exactly one 5, you may replace the other die with a 5.
HIGH FASHION: RAINBOW JACKET WITH ALL-BLACK SUIT AND FEDORA: When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword hits and a 5-5 was rolled, after resolutions choose a standard power a friendly character with the X-Men keyword has on their card. If you did, Synch can use the chosen power until the end of your next turn.
COORDINATING OUTFITS AND POWERS: Perplex. When Synch uses it to target a friendly character, if that character has a High Fashion trait, the next time that character hits this turn they can use their High Fashion trait regardless of the attack result.
Trade Synch Want Synch
Post Comment
Comments
August 11, 2022
Oathful
Probably my favorite of the Gala X-Men, Synch really makes the team. His ability to confirm at least one Gala fashion trait a turn makes him a must play if you are using other Gala members, on top of the fact that it's tied to a friendly perplex so you're increasing their stats, this guy is an amazing support/secondary attacker. Icing on the cake is that if he's the only one with a Gala trait on the team, he can just Perplex himself and take powers from friendlies to be self sustainable. The two I'm wanting to pair him with are Emma and Wolverine, SAFEGAURD: Outwit or 2 healing for landing an attack seems like good boons to be able to pick from just from using perplex, and being able to take their Invincible/Combat Reflexes respectively if they happen to get the 5-5 roll naturally is good. Plus I just really like the colorful coat, so there's that xD. // Thematic: 9/10, Viability: 8/10, Fun Factor: 9/10, fairly balanced figure
